text: Lodhran Junction railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Lodhran city, Lodhran district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Lodhran District Category:Railway stations on Lodhran–Khanewal Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Lodhran–Raiwind Line Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Lodhran Junction railway station
